com.mishmash.alpha.presentation
Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
  com.mishmash.alpha.presentation.GuiController

public class GuiController
extends java.lang.Object

Handles GUI interaction with the framework. Does not construct any items, but has an instance of the VehicleFactory that can be used to get all objects.

Method Detail

updateMap

public void updateMap(VehicleGuiPart part,
                      java.lang.String partName)
Updates the map that connects vehicle parts (as the gui understands them) to the name of the part being used.

Parameters:
part - The vehicle part as understood by the gui.
partName - The name of the part in question.

getOutPutText

public java.lang.String getOutPutText()
Gets the output text to display to the user, usually a distance traveled.

Returns:
A string to display to the user about the output of the vehicle created.

getPartsForType

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPartsForType(VehicleType type,
                                                        VehicleGuiPart guiPart)
Gets the list of available parts (designated by name) for the given gui vehicle part and type of vehicle. The vehicle type is cached for future calculations.

Parameters:
type - The vehicle type.
guiPart - The vehicle part.
Returns:
A list of allowable values to be used in the display.
